description:
Hey there, story lovers! Looking for a perfect romance novel? Or would you prefer to dive into the paranormal world? Whatever your preferences are, we’ve got you covered. My Passion is exactly the place where you can indulge inthousands of the best books: romance, mystery or fantasy novels that will make your world become topsy-turvy.

Here’re just a few TAGS & GENRES among dozens we have:
Werewolf
Billionaire
New Adult
Hot
Romantic
Paranormal
Marriage
Suspense
Fan fiction
and others

FEATURES
- Immerse yourself into the fiction world with free samples.
- Add favorite books to your personal library and manage reading time.
- Download chapters and enjoy offline reading ebooks.
- Get relevant book recommendations.
- Customize your reading experience (font, light/dark mode, etc.)

SPECIAL OFFERS
Daily Rewards. Claim coins for 6 days and get your Super Gift.
Reading Rewards. Read on our platform for 15 minutes to claim coins.
Earn coins for watching ads and creating the account.

All books on My Passion are personal & somewhat heroic life trajectories of the protagonists. Our avid readers feel at ease, “unconstrained” & “amused” when they read our novels.

New episodes released every day
Exclusive novels & Steamy stories
Award-Winning Authors

Silenza – Your Daily Moment of Stillness 
Find peace in silence.
Silenza invites you to pause for just one minute each day — no movement, no sound, no distractions.
If you stay completely still and silent, you’ll unlock a new serene illustration from the World of Calm collection.
 
Each day adds to your streak and opens a new piece of tranquil beauty — a quiet motivation to return, breathe, and simply be.
 
Key Features:
• 60-second “moment of silence” sessions
• Motion, sound, and touch detection for full mindfulness immersion
• Daily streak tracker to keep your calm routine
• Unlockable collection of peaceful illustrations
• Minimalist, atmospheric design
• Gentle animations and sounds for inner balance
 
Embrace silence. Discover stillness. Unlock peace with Silenza.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Brainometry - Master Mathematics Through Interactive Learning Transform the way you learn mathematics. Brainometry is a comprehensive learning platform designed for students aged 10-16, offering interactive problem-solving, visual explanations, and adaptive practice across all essential math topics. 

COMPLETE MATH CURRICULUM Master 10 comprehensive topics covering middle school mathematics:
- Algebra: Variables, expressions, and algebraic manipulation
- Geometry: Shapes, angles, area, and volume
- Fractions: Operations, simplification, and conversions
- Decimals: Arithmetic operations and place value
- Percentages: Calculations and real-world applications
- Ratios and Proportions: Scaling and relationships
- Exponents and Powers: Laws and scientific notation
- Equations: Linear equations and problem-solving
- Word Problems: Real-world mathematical reasoning
- Statistics: Data analysis, mean, median, and graphs

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

Informat.ro - Stiri din diferite surse!
Descarcă acum cea mai avansată aplicație de știri din România!
Economisește timp și rămâi informat! Informat.ro îți sumarizează știrile și îți arată diversele unghiuri prin care le interpretează diferite publicații.
Stiri360 - fie că ești interesat de știri economice, politice sau sociale, le găsești pe toate într-un singur loc.
- Parcurgi rapid știri sintetizate și vezi cum sunt tratate în diferite publicații. Prin sumarizarea eficientă și prezentarea diverselor perspective editoriale asupra unei stiri, Informat.ro te ajută să îți formezi o opinie educată.
- Cauți termeni care te interesează sau pui întrebări si primești un răspuns sintetizat cu AI împreuna cu cele mai relevante știri
- Personalizează-ți feedul în funcție de categoriile tale de interes.
- Primești notificări pentru cele mai importante stiri de ultimă oră și evenimente din categoriile selectate de tine.
- Citește stiri în dark mode pentru o experiență îmbunătățită în condiții de luminozitate scăzută. 
 Actualizăm constant aplicația, în baza feedback-ului tău, pentru a te ține la curent cu cele mai noi știri

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Investigații, documentare și reportaje video, cele mai importante știri ale zilei și dezbateri. Poți accesa ușor și rapid toate materialele Recorder din această aplicație de mobil cu design simplu și intuitiv.

Aplicația Recorder oferă un sistem de notificări personalizat prin care decizi tu ce tip de conținut urmărești, nu decid algoritmii în locul tău. Poți afla de fiecare dată când publicăm o nouă investigație video, când apare o nouă dezbatere cu jurnaliștii Recorder sau când publicăm Știrile zilei.

Conținutul aplicației Recorder este 100% gratuit și este actualizat zilnic, astfel încât să fii la curent cu cele mai importante și relevante evenimente din România. Acest lucru este posibil datorită donatorilor noștri, care ne sprijină prin donații lună de lună și care ne ajută să continuăm să producem jurnalism de calitate și pus în serviciul public.

De ce să descarci aplicația?
● Îți poți crea un cont de urmăritor Recorder, unde ne poți susține printr-o donație sau ne poți trimite mesaje, pentru a intra în legătură direct cu jurnaliștii din redacția Recorder.
● Poți primi notificări personalizate, în funcție de tipul de conținut pe care îl preferi
● Urmărești și asculți materialele Recorder într-un mediu în care tu controlezi ce vrei să vezi, nu algoritmii rețelelor sociale

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Atentie! Contentul aplicatiei nu este gratis, pentru a putea avea acces ai nevoie de un abonament PREMIUM.

Cu abonamentul PREMIUM ai acces la toate categoriile de mai jos:

Verdict Politic:
Video zilnic de satira politica.

Verdict Mafioti si Verdict Ametite:
Mesaje zilnice sub forma de glume si satire despre comportamente sociale, atitudini general valabile si situatii reale de viata. 

Verdict Media:
Revista a presei interne si internationale, printr o selectie vasta de articole si opinii.

Verdict Smart Rau:
Opinii personale si ale unor viitori invitati despre subiecte foarte destepte din toate domeniile, analize financiare, sociologice si culturale.

Verdict Stil:
Informatii si sfaturi stilistice si vestimentare, liste cu trenduri si shopping, do’s and dont’s.

Verdict Lifestyle:
Articole si texte despre ceea ce inseamna sa traiesti frumos, sa calatoresti, sa mananci, sa alegi. 

Fatalaul Zilei:
Rubrica de satira despre personajul zilei care s a aflat in cea mai comica situatie. 

Va Rupem Pe Genunchi:
O posta a redactiei unde subscriberii isi pot exprima liberi opiniile si mesajele le vor aparea.

Read the novel and comic version of the hottest anime – Solo Leveling (Only I Level Up)! 

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html

Got a growing TBR list? See great book recommendations, but forget them later? Meet TBR Bookshelf!

Easily track books you want to read, are currently reading, or have finished with no limits. Rate and review books once you’ve read them and log your favorite moments using our quick and intuitive rating system. Browse public ratings to see a book’s POV, tropes, reread rate, and up to four genre-specific ratings. For example, Romance tracks Spice, Fluff, Humor, and Tear. All ratings are anonymous, so you can be honest with your reviews.

Within our rating system, you can log:
* Reading format
* 5 Star Rating including half stars
* Up to four genre ratings
* If you would reread a book
* DNF (Did Not Finish)
* Favorite characters and quotes
* Series and standalone books
* Pro quotes and annotations (Paid Subscription Required)
* Any additional thoughts about the book
Celebrate your reading milestones with special book confetti and earn stickers for completing books and certain book tropes.
Exclusive Pro features include:
* Book tropes
* Book playlists to track songs (cannot be played within the app)
* POV format and amount
* TV show and movie adaptation ratings
* Four seasonal ratings
All users can create custom yearly reading goals. When you finish a book, it is automatically added to your yearly reading goal bookshelf. Pro users can also fully customize their bookshelves with color themes, bookshelf items, and layouts.

TBR Bookshelf makes managing your TBR list fun, easy, and satisfying. Track books, set reading goals, log quotes, and discover new reads all in one place. With customizable shelves, anonymous ratings, and a supportive community, staying on top of your reading has never been more enjoyable.

Join TBR Bookshelf, a woman-owned and operated company, BookTok’s favorite, and trusted by millions of readers.

TBR Bookshelf is free to download and use. No account or sign-up is required. TBR Bookshelf Pro includes a 7-day free trial and then options for a monthly plan ($4.99), a 6-month plan ($19.99), or a yearly plan ($29.99). All other features remain free indefinitely.

A subscription will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of your free trial. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Note: This app is for tracking your reading journey. Reading is not available within the app.

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS

DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS

SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.

KTool.io: Send web articles, newsletters and RSS to Kindle. Build a reading habit with KTool today!

You spend too much time on computer screens. It damages our eyesight and hurts our comprehension.

KTool helps you read everything on Kindle instead.

Less eyestrain. More focus 

———

H O W    T O    U S E

Installing this app will add a KTool Share Target to your mobile phone. Share articles with KTool Share Target to read them on your Kindle.

Send long web articles to your Kindle to read later. Read anywhere: on your Kindle e-reader or the Kindle app on your smartphone (any platform). Articles are available for offline reading once delivered to the Kindle.

———

F E A T U R E S

— New: Send documents to Kindle (PDF, DOCX and EPUB)
— Add articles to Daily Read or Weekly Read
— Read newsletter on Kindle
— Send Wikipedia articles to Kindle
— Send Hacker News discussions to Kindle
— Dark Mode

— Speedy delivery to your Kindle
— Support articles behind paywalls
— Image support
— Emoji support
— Keyboard short-cut support
— Read Twitter threads on Kindle
— Read RSS on Kindle (WIP)

KTool can send to the following devices:

—  Kindle e-readers sold by Amazon
—  iPhone/iPad Kindle app
—  Kindle app on other platforms

———

T E S T    D R I V E

You can test KTool's functionality without install the plugin by using this web portal: https://ktool.io/read-on-kindle

Example articles:

1. The saddest “just ship it” story (2020)
https://kitze.io/posts/saddest-just-ship-it-story-ever

2. Substack’s Ideology
https://every.to/divinations/substack-s-ideology

———

C O N T A C T

KTool: https://ktool.io
Support: daniel (at) podzim.co
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ktool_io

———

P R I V A C Y

This extension does not do anything unless you click the Send to Kindle button. We do not monitor or inject any scripts into your pages while you browse.

When you click the Kindle icon, this extension sends the contents of the page and its URL to the KTool service. The KTool service then packages the contents into a reader-ready format and delivers it to your Kindle.

Content which you process with the KTool service will be cached on the server for a short period.

More information on our privacy page: https://ktool.io/privacy. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

T E R M S  O F  U S E

Explore the Past Like Never Before – Your Ultimate History Companion!

Step into the world of history with the most immersive and interactive history app available! Whether you’re a student, a trivia enthusiast, or just someone who loves the past, our app is designed to make learning history fun, engaging, and deeply informative. From ancient wonders to modern revolutions, this history encyclopedia has it all! Download now and start your journey through time.

Explore history every day with expertly curated insights, deep dives, and timeless knowledge. This history app offers a rich collection of history facts, biographies, and cultural insights, bringing the past to life through engaging storytelling and in-depth analysis.

Daily History & Encyclopedia-Style Learning
• Discover daily history updates, daily facts, today in history and daily random facts about pivotal events, legendary figures, and forgotten stories
• Browse a vast encyclopedia of history, culture, and philosophy, drawing inspiration from Wikipedia, history channel and other apps
• Explore timelines of civilizations, from the ancient world to the medieval era and beyond
• Gain insights from great thinkers like Socrates, Plato, and the Stoics, shaping your understanding of history and thought
• Discover the influence of art history, literature, and philosophy on human civilization

Exclusive History Content & Audio Vault
• Dive into detailed world history lessons covering ancient civilizations, medieval times, and modern events
• Explore art history, famous leaders, groundbreaking inventions, and pivotal wars
• Access a vast encyclopedia of historical knowledge, similar to Wiki, with expertly curated articles
• Listen to history podcasts and curated content similar to history hit and other apps

Learn History & National Geographic with AI-Powered Exploration
• Expand your vocabulary and knowledge with learn words and historical terminology explanations
• Connect history with geography by tracing the movements of civilizations, explorers, and empires, paladin and more
• Ask our History AI any question and get instant, well-researched answers
• Chat with historical figures and experience interactive storytelling
• Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, just like a history vault of knowledge!

History Quiz Weekly Series - Test Your Knowledge Every Week
• Every week features 4 themed categories with 10 fresh, curated questions each
• Categories span Wars & Battles, Exploration & Discovery, Science & Technology, Art & Culture, Leaders & Legends, and more
• Learn as you play with instant answer explanations
• Perfect for quick sessions you can finish in minutes, with real learning that sticks.

Whether you’re interested in culture, philosophy, or historical networks, this app provides a gateway to understanding the past. Just for today, start your journey into history.
